slides.title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefits Overview
slides.content: This slide outlines the benefits available under the Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Plan. It details two main types of benefits: Hospital Admission and Daily Inpatient Services. The Hospital Admission Benefit is paid under specific conditions, including medical necessity and coverage for a specified disease or injury. It also requires the insured to be confined in a hospital. The Daily Inpatient Services Benefit covers various types of care including intensive care, coronary care, and surgery, with specific conditions and exclusions. The slide also discusses the payment structure for anesthesia during inpatient surgery and sets out exclusions and limitations for certain conditions.

slides.title: Group Accident Benefits Overview
slides.content: The slide outlines the benefits available under the group accident policy, specifically focusing on Hospital Admission, Daily Hospital Confinement, Intensive Care/Coronary Care Unit, and Emergency Room Visits. Each benefit is conditional upon hospital stays being medically necessary and due to injuries covered under the policy. Details include benefit payment conditions, the duration of payments, and specific exclusions or requirements for claims.

slides.title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Description of Benefits
slides.content: The slide outlines the coverage details for various hospital indemnity benefits. These include Day Outpatient Surgery Benefit, Day Inpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-Ray and Laboratory Test Benefits, Day Inpatient Laboratory Test Benefit, Day Outpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-Ray and Laboratory Test Benefits, and Day Outpatient Laboratory Test Benefit. Each section specifies the conditions under which the benefits are provided, typically requiring that procedures are performed in a Hospital or an Ambulatory Surgical Center, and are prescribed by a Physician. Coverage excludes certain scenarios such as procedures not confined to a Hospital.

slides.title: Group Accident Description of Benefits
slides.content: This document outlines benefits related to daily inpatient and outpatient surgery, diagnostic radiology, x-ray, imaging, and laboratory tests for covered persons under a group accident plan. It specifies benefits for surgeries, treatments, and diagnostic tests performed in a hospital setting. The benefits are contingent upon the medical necessity and appropriateness as determined by a physician.

slides.title: NCE Association Membership Benefits
slides.content: The slide provides an overview of the NCE, a national association offering membership benefits and services to small and medium-sized businesses. It highlights the purchase of Combined Form with NCE Membership, which includes Group Accident Insurance Plans. These benefits are subject to state laws and conditions. The Premier Plan Insured Benefits replace medical insurance, covering accidents but not illness. Eligibility for Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance Plans is determined by state laws. Members have access to ID cards with instructions and contact information.

slides.title: NCE Association Membership Benefits
slides.content: The slide outlines the benefits of NCE Association Membership, emphasizing no waiting periods or pre-existing condition limitations for services such as medical, dental, pharmacy discount card, and accident insurance. It introduces the GapAfford Plus program offering discounts on medical services and various care services. The slide also highlights discounts available through the First Health Network, providing access to a wide range of healthcare providers with savings on medical services. Additionally, it notes the extensive reach of the First Health Network, covering multiple providers across the U.S.

slides.title: NCE Association Membership Benefits - GapAfford Plus
slides.content: The slide provides an overview of various benefits available to members of the NCE Association's GapAfford Plus program. It covers a range of services including prescription discounts, telemedicine access, pet and hearing care, medical supplies, laboratory services, dental plans, and more. The services aim to reduce healthcare costs and improve accessibility to necessary treatments and consultations for members.

slides.title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
slides.content: This slide outlines the exclusions for Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefits. It lists specific situations where benefits are not covered, such as injuries from active military service, self-inflicted harm, participation in illegal activities, and experimental treatments. Exclusions also include care for mental illness, substance abuse, normal pregnancy, and cosmetic surgery, among others. The slide emphasizes that benefits do not cover any loss resulting from conditions that are not directly due to illness or accidental injury.

slides.title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
slides.content: This slide outlines exclusions for group hospital fixed indemnity benefits, including treatments like blood disorders, routine vision care, and participation in hazardous activities. It also mentions exclusions for care outside the country, cosmetic surgery, and prescription drugs. There is a pre-existing conditions limitation, where coverage is not provided for the first 12 months for hospital, surgery, and anesthesia benefits. Additional disclaimers emphasize that this plan is not comprehensive medical insurance.

slides.title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions
slides.content: This slide outlines the exclusions for group accident benefits, listing specific situations and conditions under which no benefits will be paid. These include self-inflicted injuries, acts of war, participation in certain sports, injuries while committing a felony, and driving under the influence, among others. It also covers exclusions related to Workers' Compensation and specific travel activities.

slides.title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions
slides.content: The slide details exclusions for group accident benefits, focusing on situations where coverage is not applicable. Exclusions include treatments related to temporomandibular joint (TMJ) disorders, participation in military activities, travel by certain vehicles, and injuries from specific activities like piloting or skydiving. Additional exclusions cover injuries from illegal acts, war, and self-inflicted injuries. The slide emphasizes that these benefits do not cover losses related to sickness or disease unless authenticated by a doctor.

slides.title: Insurance Offer for NCE Members
slides.content: The slide promotes Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance options underwritten by the United States Fire Insurance Company. These insurance products are offered exclusively to NCE members.

slides.title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance Plans
slides.content: This slide presents various insurance plans, detailing the daily hospital confinement benefits and emergency room visit compensations for different plan tiers, ranging from 100 Plan to 1000+ Plan. It also includes benefits for surgeries, anesthesia, and outpatient services. Additionally, group accident benefits are outlined, specifying accidental death coverage and hospital admission benefits. The plans are available in multiple states.

slides.title: Termination of Insurance Policies
slides.content: This slide outlines the conditions and procedures for the termination of insurance policies. It includes details on policy termination dates, insured person's termination, and dependent's termination. The policy can terminate automatically on the policy expiration date, on the premium due date if unpaid, or at the policyholder's request. Insured persons are terminated if they are no longer eligible, upon the earliest of certain events, or upon request. Dependents' coverage ends if they no longer qualify, or upon the insured person's termination. Premium refund policies are also mentioned.

page_summaries.title: Insurance Offer for NCE Members
page_summaries.summary: The slide promotes Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance options underwritten by the United States Fire Insurance Company. These insurance products are offered exclusively to NCE members.

page_summaries.title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance Plans
page_summaries.summary: This slide presents various insurance plans, detailing the daily hospital confinement benefits and emergency room visit compensations for different plan tiers, ranging from 100 Plan to 1000+ Plan. It also includes benefits for surgeries, anesthesia, and outpatient services. Additionally, group accident benefits are outlined, specifying accidental death coverage and hospital admission benefits. The plans are available in multiple states.
